channel.title: Rune MTP 634
channel.description: I need help adding a donator status to people. how would i make it so that they have a title infront of there name and have rights to different things. And also i would like to make the door to nex south of godwars donator only access.

item.title: Rune MTP 634

item.description:

Add a condition to the door for the Nex thing. Only donators can kill a certain boss, sounds like a winner to me.
